page.title: 19Employment Parent's Work
page.content: {We asked 41 familes about their {parents work} {Fathers work. Miners 22 Lorry driver 1 Bus driver 1 Tyre service manager 1 Excavator driver 1 Road construction worker 1 Council worker 1 Pit guard 1 Refuse collector driver 1 Telephone linesman 1 Radar operator 1 Electricity board 1 Salesman 1 Factory worker 1 Farmer 1 Farm worker 1 Deputy prison governor 1 Unemployed 3. { {Mothers work.} Housewife 25 Canteen cook 1 Hairdresser 2 Nurse 1 Part-time shop assistant 3 Bar maid 1 Dish washer 1 Opticians receptionist 1 Sales/receptionist 1 Cleaner 1 Homehelp 1 Factory worker 1 Part-time School secretary 1.
